phrases.text: Hò iêng ớ mình ơi ơ hới

culturalContext.description: Traditional rowing song call with vocables (iêng, ớ, hới) that have no literal meaning but create rhythmic rowing cadence
facts: Hò đò dọc is a Southern Vietnamese rowing song genre
culturalContext.musicalContext: Opening refrain with strong rhythmic emphasis matching rowing strokes

phrases.text: Thuyền anh ở bến mới ra
phrases.english: Your boat just left the dock

culturalContext.description: Describes the boat's departure from the dock, establishing the narrative setting
facts: Bến (dock) is a central gathering point in river communities
Rowing songs often describe boat movements and encounters
culturalContext.musicalContext: Narrative phrase with steady rhythm matching rowing pace

phrases.text: Thuyền em thì ở xa xa mới về
phrases.english: My boat just returned from far away

culturalContext.description: Contrasts with the previous line, creating a meeting scenario between two boats
facts: Xa xa (far away) suggests a long journey on the river
The use of 'em' (younger/humble) and 'anh' (older/respectful) indicates social dynamics
culturalContext.musicalContext: Slightly longer phrase with emphasis on 'xa xa' (far away)

phrases.text: Lênh đênh đôi chiếc thuyền kề
phrases.english: Two boats drifting side by side

culturalContext.description: Romantic imagery of two boats meeting on the river, common metaphor in Vietnamese folk songs
facts: Lênh đênh evokes the gentle motion of boats on calm water
Two boats meeting is often a metaphor for romantic encounter
Reflects the social interaction that happens on waterways
culturalContext.musicalContext: Lyrical phrase with flowing melody matching 'lênh đênh' (drifting)

phrases.text: Bên ấy có chật thì về bên đây
phrases.english: If it's crowded there, come to this side

culturalContext.description: Playful invitation with double meaning - literal (rowing space) and romantic (personal invitation)
facts: Common flirting technique in rowing songs
Reflects the communal and social nature of river work
Conditional structure (thì) creates gentle suggestion rather than command
culturalContext.musicalContext: Phrase with rising inflection on the conditional 'thì', creating anticipation

phrases.text: Hò iêng ớ mình ơi ơ hời

culturalContext.description: Closing refrain identical to opening, creating circular song structure typical of work songs
facts: Repetition reinforces the rhythmic rowing pattern
Circular structure allows continuous singing during long rowing sessions
culturalContext.musicalContext: Closing refrain with same melody as opening, signaling song completion or repetition
